items.title: Jim Cramer Says That Amgen’s Stock “Did Not Deserve to Get Hit This Hard”
items.description: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is one of the 11 stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope recently. Cramer highlighted Wall Street’s reaction to the company’s latest data announcement regarding MariTide, and said: “Unlike Mounjaro or Ozempic, which needed to be injected once a week, Amgen’s MariTide is one shot per month. I prefer monthly over weekly […]
